title: Proposed changes in LCR rules to slow credit growth: Icra
description: Banks' liquidity coverage ratio (LCR) is set to decrease due to a rise in wholesale deposits and a decline in retail deposits, necessitating investments in high quality liquid assets. This shift could slow credit growth and keep interest rates on retail deposits high, despite anticipated rate cuts.
